arStrings.szText: {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage to enemies who are Slowed, and {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage to enemies who are Stunned or Immobilized. These bonuses stack and apply to Shadow damage dealt by your Minions.

{icon:bullet,1.2} Bonus {c_important}Darkness{/c} Damage vs. Slowed {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c}
{icon:bullet,1.2} Bonus {c_important}Darkness{/c} Damage vs. Stunned or Immobilized {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c}
